project_name.justification: Golden Mile has entered into a joint venture-acquisition agreement with Outcrop Silver & Gold Corporation (“Outcrop”) for the Pearl Copper Project located in Arizona, United States.

company_name.justification: Golden Mile Resources Limited (“Golden Mile”; “the Company”; ASX: “G88”) is pleased to report the Company has completed successful due diligence and entered into a joint venture-acquisition agreement with Outcrop Silver & Gold Corporation (“Outcrop”) over the Pearl Copper Project located in Arizona, United States of America (“USA”).

ceo_buyer.justification: Golden Mile’s Managing Director, Damon Dormer stated: “The completion of due diligence has reinforced our belief in the Pearl Copper Project as a potential game-changer for the Company.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Golden Mile and Outcrop have agreed on terms for Golden Mile to acquire up to a 100% ownership of the Pearl Copper Project through a staged, earn in and dilution, investment of up to $A 12 million over eight years along with up to a 2% net smelter royalty.

primary_commodity.justification: The document is titled 'Joint venture-acquisition over copper project in Arizona USA' and refers to the project as the 'Pearl Copper Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: No URL was provided in the source documents.

currency.justification: The consideration includes payments specified in Australian dollars: '(i) to pay Outcrop US AUD$100,000 on the date of execution of the definitive agreement (Settlement Date)' and 'The Company may earn 51% of the issued share capital of Zaya US by expending a total of AUD$2,000,000'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of the initial payment of AUD$100,000 and a conditional milestone payment of AUD$2,000,000. Quotes: '(i) to pay Outcrop US AUD$100,000 on the date of execution of the definitive agreement (Settlement Date)' and '(d) JORC Resource The Company agreed to pay Outcrop AUD$2,000,000 upon such time as a JORC compliant resource achieves 750,000 metric tonnes of contained copper at a minimum grade of 0.3%.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Cash payments are specified separately, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any issuance of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in share warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares are being issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total potential exploration investment is the sum of the first earn-in (AUD$2,000,000) and the second earn-in (AUD$10,000,000). The text also summarizes this: 'investment of up to $A 12 million over eight years'.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement includes a potential total royalty of 2%, comprising an initial 1% NSR and an additional 1% upon dilution. 'Golden Mile and Outcrop have agreed on terms for Golden Mile to acquire up to a 100% ownership of the Pearl Copper Project through a staged, earn in and dilution, investment of up to $A 12 million over eight years along with up to a 2% net smelter royalty.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Project consists of 241 unpatented mining claims (4,983 acres), approximately 20.2km2, with numerous copper occurrences...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Project consists of 241 unpatented mining claims (4,983 acres), approximately 20.2km2, with numerous copper occurrences...

resource_size.justification: The text does not state a current mineral resource. A payment is contingent on achieving a future resource, indicating none currently exists. 'The Company agreed to pay Outcrop AUD$2,000,000 upon such time as a JORC compliant resource achieves 750,000 metric tonnes of contained copper...'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Golden Mile Resources Limited (“Golden Mile”; “the Company”; ASX: “G88”) is pleased to report the Company has completed successful due diligence...
